name: Furkas Xoud

specials.name: Tower Bound
specials.description: Furkas Xoud is tightly bound to his tower. He is able to move from the Choking Tower to its dungeons and back, but may not venture out into the woods.

specials.name: Spectral Miasma
specials.description: 20 feet. After Xoud casts a spell with the air, poison or water traits, fog continues to emanate from his body for 1 round. Any creature that ends its turn in this miasma takes 2d6 negative damage - including Xoud, who has negative healing (DC 35 basic Fortitude save). Any creature in the miasma is concealed and treats other creatures as concealed, but Xoud can see through this concealment.

specials.name: Rejuvenation
specials.description:
When Xoud is destroyed, he re-forms after 2d4 days within the location he's bound to, fully healed. He can only be permanently put to rest if someone destroys him and during the time he is rejuvenating, meet two of the following conditions:
* The smoke furnace must be deactivated or destroyed.
* His eversmoking bottle must be removed from his tower or destroyed
* The thought harvester robot and the two robot apprentices must be destroyed.

specials.name: Puff of Smoke
specials.description: Frequency once per hour; Trigger Furkas Xoud is dealt damage; Effect Furkas Xoud disappears in a puff of smoke and reappears in Lab Zero: Mnemotechnic Recovery (Area G9). Xoud typically uses this after two rounds of combat or after taking a critical hit.

specials.name: Drain Bonded Item
specials.description: Frequency once per day; Requirements Furkas Xoud hasn't acted yet on this turn; Effect Xoud expends the power stored in his brooch of shielding. This gives him the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

items: rod of gripping smoke^, brooch of shielding
spells: disintegrate, chromatic image, wall of force
dispel magic, mirror image, obscuring mist

resistance.value: all damage 10 (except force, ghost touch, or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical)

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious

languages: Aklo, Androffan, Auran, Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Hallit, Ignan, Orcish
